title: Bug 116786 Library include should store relative path.
OB: When checking the report design, I noticed that the <property name="fileName"/> tag stores the absolute path of the library file instead of the relative path.
EB: Bug 116786 Library include should store relative path. When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for the library file. For example, if my report design is located in $project/test, the relative path for the library file should be stored.
